data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Torino with the kick-off.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 2, Fiorentina drive forward but Franck Ribery is judged offside.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Torino.
In the minute 4, Giacomo Bonaventura (Fiorentina) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rosario Abisso signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Torino's area.
Rosario Abisso signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Torino's half.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Alfred Duncan (Fiorentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Attention is being given to Fiorentinaâ€™s Franck Ribery and play has been suspended briefly.
Franck Ribery is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick in a good position for Torino!
Corner awarded to Torino.
Torino are pushing forward but Soualiho Meite's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 11, Rosario Abisso awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Torino to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
The match at Stadio Artemio Franchi has been interrupted briefly for a check on Andrea Belotti, who is down injured.
Andrea Belotti returns to the field for Torino after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 15, Federico Chiesa for the home team is judged to be offside.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nikola Milenkovic (Fiorentina) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 17, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Christian Kouame's header is off-target for Fiorentina.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 20, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 21, Free kick Torino.
Torino's Alex Berenguer is on target but unsuccessful.
In Florence Torino drive forward through Simone Zaza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 24, Free kick Fiorentina.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
In the minute 31, Fiorentina's Federico Chiesa is whistled for offside at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Torino.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rosario Abisso awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Rosario Abisso waits before resuming play because Simone Zaza for Torino is still down.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Torino's Simone Zaza looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Rosario Abisso signals a Torino throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 42, In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Florence, Christian Kouame (Fiorentina) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in Torino.
In the minute 44, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Torino close to the penalty box.
Federico Ceccherini is booked for the home team.
In Florence, Andrea Belotti of Torino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
Rosario Abisso will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In the minute 45, Christian Kouame (Fiorentina) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
The first half has been concluded at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Fiorentina with the kick-off.
Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi has run offside.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rosario Abisso blows against Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi for offside.
Fiorentina needs to be cautious. Torino have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, In Florence Fiorentina's Christian Kouame is caught offside.
Rosario Abisso awards the away team a throw-in.
Nikola Milenkovic of Fiorentina gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, Torino have a goal kick.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Torino needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 58, Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi has been booked in Florence.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 60, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stadio Artemio Franchi, Karol Linetty has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Torino.
Rosario Abisso signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Torino's half.
Fiorentina are coming forward and Giacomo Bonaventura gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 64, Rosario Abisso awards Torino a goal kick.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Fiorentina.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Florence to check on Simone Zaza, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 67, Torino's Simone Zaza is back in action after a slight knock.
Fiorentina's Gaetano Castrovilli gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, The away team replace Alex Berenguer with Simone Verdi.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Marco Giampaolo (Torino) is making a second substitution, with Sasa Lukic replacing Soualiho Meite.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina are coming forward and Federico Chiesa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 74, Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Torino.
Fiorentina are pushing forward but Franck Ribery's finish is wide of the goal.
Torino have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Fiorentina's Federico Chiesa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Torino defender.
Goal! Fiorentina have got their heads in front thanks to a Gaetano Castrovilli strike.
That's a fine assist from Federico Chiesa.
In the minute 79, The home team have replaced Giacomo Bonaventura with Borja Valero. This is the first substitution made today by Giuseppe Iachini.
Dusan Vlahovic is replacing Franck Ribery for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Free kick Fiorentina.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 83, Simone Zaza of Torino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pol Lirola is replacing Federico Chiesa for the home team.
In the minute 84, Gaetano Castrovilli gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 87, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Marco Giampaolo is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Artemio Franchi with Vincenzo Millico replacing Karol Linetty.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
Mergim Vojvoda is on a sub for Armando Izzo for Torino.
In the minute 88, Fiorentina make their fourth substitution with Lorenzo Venuti replacing Cristiano Biraghi.
Giuseppe Iachini is making the team's fifth substitution at Stadio Artemio Franchi with Patrick Cutrone replacing Christian Kouame.
In the minute 89, In Florence Fiorentina attack through Patrick Cutrone. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Fiorentina drives forward and Patrick Cutrone gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
At Stadio Artemio Franchi the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino.
Rosario Abisso signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Fiorentina's area.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Fiorentina.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andrea Belotti of Torino is pulled up for offside.
Gaetano Castrovilli for Fiorentina drives towards goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Torino.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
